## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an 'x' -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] SwiftLint passes without errors (iOS)
- [ ] Lint checks pass (Android)

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested on physical devices (not just simulators/emulators)

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the README if needed
- [ ] I have added inline code comments for complex logic
- [ ] App Store/Play Store metadata updated if needed

### Performance

- [ ] I have checked for memory leaks
- [ ] I have verified there are no performance regressions
- [ ] Build time is not significantly impacted
- [ ] App launch time is not impacted

### Security

- [ ] No hardcoded secrets or API keys
- [ ] Privacy policy updated if needed
- [ ] Location permissions properly requested
- [ ] Network calls use HTTPS
